topics.body: The problem with Eva always goes back to Shinji. Now don't get me wrong, I like the theme of him trying to stand up to his father. That's something that connects with me more than you guys know. But when the world is being invaded and you're the only one who can stop tham, you DO NOT get to sit in a corner and complain about your feelings. There are time to angst and time to nut up and get shit done.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372d66d6368726282ed0300#post_5372d66d6368726282ed0300
True, but the comic is saying that it's not the focus tests that matters, but the actual viewers themselves.
topics.author: 50d9a3aea4c72dc9b3000120

topics.body:
"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372d77f63687217d36a0000#post_5372d77f63687217d36a0000
It doesn't matter if it's reviewed well. If it doesn't succeed then you still failed. The reason Batman: The Animated Series succeeded financially is because of when it came out. The 90's, where everything was dark and brooding and had lasting appeal. Am I saying that Green Lantern is bad? Hell no. But even if you pour every ounce of effort into something you care about, if it doesn't succeed then you have next to nothing to show for it.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372d9f86368727bead90300#post_5372d9f86368727bead90300
[bq="QuasarNova"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372d96d6368722d07e60100#post_5372d96d6368722d07e60100

That leaves how many states left? About 20?[/bq]
There's only four states that aren't contested right now.  Realistically speaking by the January 1, 2017 all but one or two states will have legalized it.  Even Texas' ban is currently in the appeals court.

At this point the glbt movement is just teabagging the anti-glbt movement.
